item.title: 流媒体服务器 101
item.description: 1 摘要 针对流媒体播放服务器和客户端做的一个调查汇总。 2 H5 player vedio.js - Video.js is a web video player built from the ground up for an HTML5 world. It supports HTML5 and Flash video, as well as YouTube and Vimeo (through plugins). It supports video playback on desktops and mobile devices. This
